name: Saifeddine Baccouche

education.institution: National Institute of Applied Science and Technology, Tunis
National Institute of Applied Science and Technology, Tunis

experience.title: Summer internship
experience.description: "Zinki" is an $Al/ML$ application which enables publishers, academics, governments, intellectuals and others to convert their scanned documents either manuscript or typescript into machine-readable text. [cite: 5, 6] Tasks: Development of a Deep Learning CNN based model to adjust rotated scanned documents using Keras as a framework and training the models using GPUs. [cite: 6] Creation of a dataset by manually labeling 1248 images. [cite: 7] Creation of a web application using Streamlit to allow other users to label images by selecting the right deviation angle of scanned documents. [cite: 7]

experience.title: End of year project
experience.description: We realised a "SMART HOUSE" using Arduino and developed a mobile app using MIT App Inventor to commande the microcontroller from distance. [cite: 8, 9]

experience.title: Active member
experience.description: Participation in 8 robotics competitions (one time: 1st Prize +one time: 3rd Prize)

skills: Deep Learning: TensorFlow, Keras (Convolutional Neural Networks)
